name: Upside Jam - Jam Painting Simulator
description:
For the first time ever, step into the shoes of an individual who owns their own beautifully lit warehouse, complete with rustic hardwood floors, and paints with jam. Whether you constraint yourself to the canvas, or the whole warehouse is your canvas, there's no limit to what you can create when painting with jam. 

Create your very own artistic masterpiece with this state-of-the-art, top-of-the-line, one-of-kind Jam Painting Simulator. 

Created in 1 Day for the Farewell North Community Jam. Enjoy!
